arts.ttl: Oliver Burke hat-trick secures thrilling away win for Union Berlin over Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Union Berlin's Oliver Burke netted a hat-trick as the visitors secured a scintillating 4-3 away win against Eintracht Frankfurt, whose spirited late comeback fell just short in this seven-goal thriller. Burke sat Kauã Santos down to score complete his hat-trick with a clinical chipped effort.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Union Berlin
arts.sum: Here are the lineups for the two teams in Sunday’s early fixture.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Union Berlin preview: Eisernen aim to go level on points with Adler
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt (2-0-1, 5th) play host to 1. FC Union Berlin (1-0-2, 14th) in the fourth matchweek of the 2025/26 Bundesliga season at Deutsche Bank Park (Sunday, 15:30 CET).
